page.title: 11RIVER NIDD
page.content: There are lots of shell fish like crayfish and mussels in the river as well.When the river floods it used to cover the foot bridge,but now it only floods the fields bordering the river. Above the river bank,on the North side, there is a hill where a castle or large house used to be.There is a little sewage works which drains into the river.The river is about 1000000 years old.By the river there are birds,like moorhens,herons,mallards and ducks which make holes among the roots of trees for their homes.The level of pollution in the{NIDD}is not very high,but trout will not breed easily in it.It is not navigable any longer,but people think the{Vikings } may have used it when they were exploring this part of the land.Oyster catchers thrive on the freshwater oysters found in the river.
